price: Eso es lo que merecen recibir, y sepan que los que se niegan a creer recibirán el castigo del Infierno.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
